body.bibl: Simpson, St John. “Rams, Stags and Crosses from Sasanian Iraq: Elements of a Shared Visual Vocabulary from Late Antiquity.” In Animals, Gods and Men from East to West: Papers on Archaeology and History in Honour of Roberta Venco Ricciardi, edited by Alessandra Peruzzetto, Francesca Dorna Metzger, and Lucinda Dirven, 103–17.
